Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.pircbotx.hooks.managers.GenericListenerManager
    Due to multiple new functions of PircBotX theat depend on multiple threads, this class is deprecated and is only kept for legacy reasons or special cases. Use of this class will have unexpected results. All bots should now use ThreadedListenerManager.
    org.pircbotx.TrustingSSLSocketFactory
    This class has been superseded by UtilSSLSocketFactory, which provides much more flexibility and ease of use. This class is kept for backwards compatability only.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.OwnerEvent.isFounder()
    Use isOwner, this method being called isFounder is a bug. Will be removed in future versions
    org.pircbotx.hooks.events.VoiceEvent.isVoice()
    Use the better named hasVoice method. Will be removed in future versions
    org.pircbotx.PircBotX.waitFor(Class)
    Replaced by WaitForQueue due to racing issues. For slightly busy bots there is a high chance this will return an unrelated event. Trying to solve that by calling this multiple times could miss events dispatched between waitFor calls. WaitForQueue however saves all events it receives for later processing. See WaitForQueue for more information

    Using the specified eventClass, block until the Event occurs. Eg wait for a response from a user, capturing the MessageEvent or PrivateMessageEvent.

    Warning: The listener manager in use must support multithreading. If not, the entire bot will freeze since its waiting in the same thread that's reading input from the server. This means you can't use GenericListenerManager.
